data.title: Hi, I am Alefay Kombil
data.text: Frontend developer with a passion for UI/UX design. I build beautiful and functional user interfaces with React and other frontend technologies.

aboutData.title: Alefay Kombil
aboutData.subtitle: Front-end Developer
aboutData.text: As a devoted Front-End Developer, I bring a robust background in UI/UX design. Proficient in modern technologies and diverse Content Management Tool. I apply my skills to create engaging digital experiences. With a foundation built on experience in the Hospitality and Tourism Industry, I prioritize user needs to deliver a seamless online journey. Recognized for my creative approach, attention to detail, and effective problem-solving skills, I am dedicated to continuous learning, always staying ahead of the curve with the latest tech trends.

services.title: UI/UX Design
